page.title: 20Cartmel Peninsula
page.content:
The area where you will find the villages of Allithwaite and Flookburgh is known as the Cartmel Peninsula. It is a very interesting area,full of history and places to visit.There are lots of old villages and the scenery is beautiful.It is pastoral and gentle, in sharp contrast to the rugged areas of the Lake District. The area is well worth a visit and we all hope you will do your own exploration.
The staff and children of Flookburgh and Allithwaite C.E. Primary Schools wish to thank everyone who helped in this contribution.
